text: William James Remar (born December 31, 1953), known professionally as James Remar, is an American actor and voice actor. He is known for his roles in Sex and the City, The Warriors, 48 Hrs., The Cotton Club, Mortal Kombat: Annihilation, Vampire Diaries, and in Dexter. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Boston
title: James Remar
